<small>Also see: **<big>[[H0693|אָרַב]]</big>**</small>

 <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רִיב‎</span> [[[BDB#Nö|Nö]]<sup>ZMG xxxvii (1883). 530, 534</sup> [[BDB#Ges|Ges]]<sup>«GKC:73b»§ 73b</sup>] **verb** ==strive, contend== (compare Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> (<img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">) ***agitate*** (the mind), <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***disquiet***; compare also Syriac <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***cry, shout***, Aph\`el also ***quarrel noisily***, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***shouting, clamour*** (see [[BDB#Nö|Nö]]<sup>l.c</sup>.); on Sabean proper name <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ריב‎</span> = Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> see [[BDB#DHM|DHM]]<sup>ib. 14</sup>); — 

**Qal** ***Perfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רָב‎</span> [[Judg.11.25|Judg 11:25]]; [[1Sam.25.29|1Sam 25:29]] 2 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רַבְתָּ‎</span> [[Lam.3.58|Lam 3:58]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רִיבוֺתָ‎</span> [[Job.33.13|Job 33:13]], etc.; ***Imperfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יָרִיב‎</span> [[Judg.6.31|Judg 6:31]] +, jussive <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יָרֵב‎</span> [[Hos.4.4|Hos 4:4]]; [[1Sam.24.16|1Sam 24:16]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יָ֫רֶב‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לוֺ(בּוֺׅ‎</span> [[Judg.6.31|Judg 6:31]]; [[Judg.6.32|Judg 6:32]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַיָּ֫רֶב‎</span> [[Gen.31.36|Gen 31:36]] +; 2 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תרוב‎</span> [[Prov.3.30|Prov 3:30]] [[BDB#Kt|Kt]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תָּרִיב‎</span> [[BDB#Qr|Qr]]; 3 masculine plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יְרִיבֻן‎</span> [[Exod.21.18|Exod 21:18]], etc.; ***Imperative*** masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רִיב‎</span> [[Mic.6.1|Mic 6:1]]; [[Prov.25.9|Prov 25:9]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רִיבָה‎</span> [[Ps.35.1|Ps 35:1]] +, masculine plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רִיבוּ‎</span> [[Isa.1.17|Isa 1:17]]; [[Hos.2.4|Hos 2:4]] ***Infinitive absolute*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רוֺב‎</span> [[Judg.11.25|Judg 11:25]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רֹב‎</span> [[Job.40.2|Job 40:2]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רִיב‎</span> [[Jer.50.34|Jer 50:34]] ([[BDB#Ges|Ges]]<sup>«GKC:73d»§ 73d</sup> [[BDB#Kö|Kö]]<sup>i. 509</sup> [[BDB#Ba|Ba]]<sup>NB 80</sup>); ***construct*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רִיב‎</span> [[Isa.3.13|Isa 3:13]]; [[Job.9.3|Job 9:3]] + [[Judg.21.22|Judg 21:22]] [[BDB#Qr|Qr]] ([[BDB#Kt|Kt]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רוב‎</span>), <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רִב‎</span> [[Amos.7.4|Amos 7:4]]; [[Prov.25.8|Prov 25:8]] ***Participle*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רָב‎</span> [[Isa.19.20|Isa 19:20]] +; — ***strive:*** 

**1.** involving bodily struggle [[Exod.21.18|Exod 21:18]] (that is, one with another; [[BDB#E|E]]); public hostilities, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יָרָיוּ רָב לוֺ‎</span> [[Deut.33.7|Deut 33:7]] (with) ***his hands he strove for it***, with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עִם‎</span> of Israel, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הֲרוֺב רָב‎</span> [[Judg.11.25|Judg 11:25]] (\|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נִלְחַם‎</span>). 

**2.** with words, with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ב‎</span> person [[Gen.31.36|Gen 31:36]] ([[BDB#E|E]]), [[Exod.17.2|Exod 17:2]] a ([[BDB#J|J]]) [[Judg.6.32|Judg 6:32]], so (in figurative) [[Hos.2.4|Hos 2:4]] compare v.[[Hos.2.4|Hos 2:4]] often = ***quarrel***, with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עִם‎</span> person, [[Gen.26.20|Gen 26:20]]; [[Exod.17.2|Exod 17:2]]b [[Num.20.3|Num 20:3]] (all [[BDB#J|J]]), [[Neh.13.25|Neh 13:25]] subject God [[Job.9.3|Job 9:3]]; [[Job.13.19|Job 13:19]]; [[Job.23.6|Job 23:6]] also [[Job.40.2|Job 40:2]] (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עִם‎</span> of God; on infinitive absolute see [[BDB#Ges|Ges]]<sup>«GKC:113ee»§ 113ee</sup>), in general [[Prov.3.30|Prov 3:30]] with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֵת‎</span> person [[Judg.8.1|Judg 8:1]]; [[Neh.5.7|Neh 5:7]]; [[Neh.13.11|Neh 13:11]]; [[Neh.13.17|Neh 13:17]], subject <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎י‎</span> [[Isa.49.25|Isa 49:25]] (compare I. <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יָרִיב‎</span> below), [[Ps.35.1|Ps 35:1]] (\|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לָחַם‎</span>); <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֵת‎</span> of <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎י‎</span> [[Isa.45.9|Isa 45:9]] (participle ***one striving***), [[Num.20.13|Num 20:13]] ([[BDB#P|P]]); with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עַל‎</span> of thing [[Gen.26.21|Gen 26:21]]; [[Gen.26.22|Gen 26:22]] absolute = ***find fault*** [[Hos.4.4|Hos 4:4]] (\|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הוֺכִיחַ‎</span>). Especially 

**3.** ***conduct a*** (legal) ***case, suit***, usually figurative, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎י‎</span> subject; [[Isa.3.13|Isa 3:13]] (\|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎דִּין‎</span>), [[Isa.57.16|Isa 57:16]] (\|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קָצַף‎</span>), [[Ps.103.9|Ps 103:9]] (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נָטַר‎</span>[<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אַף‎</span>]), compare <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קֹרֵא לָרִב בָּאֵשׁ‎</span> [[Amos.7.4|Amos 7:4]] with accusative of person with whom (unfriendly sense), [[Job.10.2|Job 10:2]]; [[Isa.27.8|Isa 27:8]] with accusative of congnate meaning with verb <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רִיב‎</span> in good sense, = take one's part, [[1Sam.24.15|1Sam 24:15]] ([[BDB#Gi|Gi]]; v.[[1Sam.24.16|1Sam 24:16]] [[BDB#van d.H.|van d. H.]] [[BDB#Baer|Baer]]; \|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שָׁפַט‎</span>), [[Mic.7.9|Mic 7:9]]; [[Jer.50.34|Jer 50:34]] (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רִיב יָרִיב אֶתרִֿיבָם‎</span>, infinitive construct = infinitive absolute, see above), [[Jer.51.36|Jer 51:36]] (\|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נקם‎</span>), [[Lam.3.58|Lam 3:58]]; [[Prov.22.23|Prov 22:23]]; [[Ps.43.1|Ps 43:1]] (+ <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִגּוֺי‎</span>; \|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שָׁפַט‎</span>), [[Ps.119.154|Ps 119:154]] (+ <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎גָּאַל‎</span>), also [[Ps.74.22|Ps 74:22]] (God, his own cause); + <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִיַּד‎</span> person against whom [[1Sam.25.39|1Sam 25:39]] (of vengeance); + <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֵת‎</span> person against whom [[Prov.23.11|Prov 23:11]], so (without accusative of congnate meaning with verb) [[Isa.50.8|Isa 50:8]]; [[Jer.2.9|Jer 2:9]] (twice in verse); compare <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֶתֿ‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הֶהָרִים‎</span> [[Mic.6.1|Mic 6:1]] (II. <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֵת‎</span> **1 c**; [[BDB#Sept|ᵐ5]] <span class="bdbLangGreek">πρός</span>, whence [[BDB#We|We]] [[BDB#Now|Now]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֶלֿ‎</span> ***in the presence of***, but on <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רִיב אֶל‎</span> see 

**4.**); <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ר‎</span> = ***plead***, with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ל‎</span> person for whom [[Judg.6.31|Judg 6:31]] (3 t. in verse); [[Job.13.8|Job 13:8]], with accusative of person for whom [[Isa.1.17|Isa 1:17]], of God [[Isa.51.22|Isa 51:22]], compare [[Deut.33.8|Deut 33:8]] (obscure, see [[BDB#Dr|Dr]]); of human disputes [[Prov.25.8|Prov 25:8]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֶתרֵֿעֶ֑ךָ‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רִיבְךָ ר‎</span> v[[Prov.25.9|Prov 25:9]]. 

**4.** = ***make complaint***, with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֶל‎</span> person unto and against whom [[Judg.21.22|Judg 21:22]]; [[Jer.2.29|Jer 2:29]]; [[Jer.12.1|Jer 12:1]]; [[Job.33.13|Job 33:13]]. **Hiph\`il** ***Participle*** suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מריבו‎</span> [[1Sam.2.10|1Sam 2:10]] [[BDB#Kt|Kt]] ([[BDB#Qr|Qr]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מְרִיבָיו‎</span>), i.e. (those) ***displaying contention against him*** (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎י‎</span>), compare plural construct <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ְ ועַמְּךָ כִמְרִיבֵי כֹהֵן‎</span> [[Hos.4.4|Hos 4:4]], obscure; [[BDB#RS|RS]]<sup>Proph. 406</sup> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מָרוּ בִי‎</span> ***thy people have rebelled against me, O priest !*** Beck [[BDB#Wü|Wü]] [[BDB#We|We]] [[BDB#GASm|GASm]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וְעַמִּי כִּכְמָרָיו הַכֹּהֵן‎</span> (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הַכּ‎</span> as voc., and [by some] joined to v[[Hos.4.5|Hos 4:5]]); Hermann<sup>SK, 1879, 516 {abbrev</sup>}<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וְעִמְּךָ מְרִיבִי הַכּ‎</span>, compare [[BDB#Oort|Oort]] (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רִיבִי‎</span>); Ruben<sup>Crit, Rem. on the passage</sup> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ְ ועַמִּי כָמוֺךָ הַכּ‎</span>, so [[BDB#Now|Now]]. — <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַיָּרֶכ‎</span> [[1Sam.15.5|1Sam 15:5]] see  <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ארב‎</span> **Hiph\`il**
